rows.label: qev015002_MSG0008
rows.name:
Be reasonable, Grette! I can't just run back to the city
to pick you up a new ice-cream cake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0009
rows.name: Then go wipe out every last one of those oc-servs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0010
rows.name:
I had one tiny luxury in the midst of this hellish
wasteland, and those bastards ruined it.
Someone is going to die for that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0011
rows.name:
No, I hear you, but we're kind of busy trying to find
that noble silk...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0012
rows.name: Oh, [ST:playername ]! Perfect timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0013
rows.name:
Some Ganglion machines called oc-servs stole Grette's
ice-cream cake, and she's... Well, she's not happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0014
rows.name:
And once our little princess gets going, there's no
talking sense to her. I need some help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0015
rows.name:
Could I ask you to either gather the noble silk we need
or else go take out those oc-servs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_JNK0010
rows.name: Gather

rows.label: qev015002_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree to collect the noble silk.

rows.label: qev015002_JNK0020
rows.name: Fight

rows.label: qev015002_SEL0021
rows.name: Agree to take out the oc-servs.

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0016
rows.name:
Thanks! Meanwhile, I'll go deal with the princess's
demands...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0017
rows.name:
Excuse you, Adelbert! Don't make it sound like I'm
being unreasonable over here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0018
rows.name: Yes, ma'am! ...Anyway, I'll go avenge her snack time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'll leave the gathering to you. You should be able to
get them from noble arachnids.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0020
rows.name:
Aw, thanks. I'll allow you to be my top servant now.
Well, maybe second to Adelbert.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0021
rows.name:
Now go show those Ganglion dogs what happens
when you interrupt a lady's sacred snack time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0022
rows.name:
Yeah, sorry. She may seem a little crazy, but she's a
true soldier underneath. Try not to judge her too hard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0023
rows.name:
EXCUSE YOU, ADELBERT!
How dare you speak of me that way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0024
rows.name:
Sorry! Sorry...
Heh. Besides, I actually like crazy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015002_MSG0025
rows.name:
Anyway, thanks, [ST:playername ].
It's in your hands now. I'll get to work on
our job in the meantime.[ST:wait ]
